section.heading: Short title.
section.text: This subchapter may be cited as the “Living Wage Act of 2006”.

annoGroup.heading: Delegation of Authority
annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of Authority pursuant to D.C. Law 16-118, the “Way to Work Amendment Act of 2006”, see Mayor’s Order 2006-122, September 27, 2006 ( 53 DCR 9313).
